attributes.action: make it compulsary for mosques to have at least one wall made of strong, transparent perspex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the latest televised undercover exposure of a mosque, people are increasingly worried about what goes on inside.

A large perspex frontage/wall would enable people to see that the muslims inside were praying, not making bombs.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
